name: Fresh Watermelon Gazpacho
author: Scott Koeneman
summary: This soup is lightly sweet with just a little bite of heat from the jalapeno. The combination of both blended and diced melon and cucumber, plus the blueberries, also give it a nice contrast in texture.
ingredients: 1  cucumber - peeled, seeded, and diced, divided
directions: Put 6 cups watermelon, 1/2 of the cucumber, jalapeno pepper, and vinegar in a blender; blend until smooth
Pour gazpacho into a large bowl and stir remaining watermelon and cucumber into soup
Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
Divide gazpacho among 4 bowls and top each with blueberries
